subtitle: A tasty salad using sun-ripened vegetables with a hot salad dressing.

method.text: Cook asparagus in water for 4-5 min. Drain, rinse under cold water, then drain again.
Place asparagus, tomatoes and pine nuts in a bowl.
Whisk dressing ingredients together. Pour over the tomatoes and toss together. Arrange salad leaves (if using) on plates. Spoon on tomato and asparagus.

title: Asparagus and tomato salad
